Element.name: Subprocess
Element.Description: A <a href="/Concepts/Elements/Process/CommonElements/Subprocess"/> is a compound activity.It has detail that is defined as a flow of other activities. A Sub-Process is a graphical object within a Process Flow, but it also can be "opened up" to show another Process (either Embedded or Reusable).

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The process referenced as a subprocess.
The set of process parameters bound to the available subprocess parameters.
The set of subprocess parameters bound to the available process parameters.

The policy controlling the creation of subprocess instances. Available values are:
  • Single: the subprocess is executed just one time.
  • Loop: the subprocess is executed repeatedly until a certain condition is verified.
  • Parallel: the subprocesses work in parallel.
The condition to be verified in case of "Loop" execution policy. The condition is evaluated before the next iteration of the loop takes place.
The parameters whose value control the number of subprocesses created in case of "Loop" or "Parallel" execution policy.
